paper_abstract: In this paper, the series pattern solutions of the nonlinear reaction-diffusion-convection initial value problems are obtained by using the homotopy analysis method (HAM). A complete description of this method is derived and the convergence of this method is shown. Finally, two test examples are given. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Approximate analytical solutions of the nonlinear reaction-diffusion-convection problems
